animeTitle: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Parallel Works
animeDescription: An anthology of animated shorts featuring characters from Gurren Lagann in alternative worlds. Every clip is animated by a particular animator of GAINAX.Creators are Akira Amemiya, Shin Itagaki, Hirokazu Kojima, SUEZEN, Ryouji Masuyama, Hiroyuki Yamaga, Yoh Yoshinari, and Keisuke Watanabe
animeRelated: ['Alternative setting: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann', 'Sequel: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann: Parallel Works 2']
animeStaff: [['Yoshinari, You', 'Director, Storyboard, Planning, Key Animation, Animation Director'], ['Amemiya, Akira', 'Director'], ['Itagaki, Shin', 'Director, Storyboard, Key Animation, Animation Director'], ['Yamaga, Hiroyuki', 'Director']]
